title: Kit sponsorship revenue of German Bundesliga clubs 2019/20
yAxis: Kit sponsorship revenue in million euros
summary: In general Kit sponsorship revenue in million euros has rose over the Year.

The line drastically increased by 3.3 times from Year Bayer_04_Leverkusen_(Barmenia) to Borussia_Dortmund_(Evonik),increased by 7.8 times from Year FC_Augsburg_(WWK) to FC_Bayern_Munich_(Telekom),remained stable by 6.0 times from Year FC_Schalke_04_(Gazprom) to FSV_Mainz_05_(Kömmerling),increased by 2.5 times from Year Fortuna_Düsseldorf_(Henkel) to Hertha_BSC_Berlin_(Tedi),increased by 3.6 times from Year SC_Paderborn_(Sunmaker) to SV_Werder_Bremen_(Wiesenhof), and lastly, increased by 8.0 times from Year Union_Berlin_(Aroundtown) to VfL_Wolfsburg_(Volkswagen).
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year FC_Augsburg_(WWK) and FC_Bayern_Munich_(Telekom).
Maximum Kit sponsorship revenue in million euros, about 35.0 was reported at Year FC_Bayern_Munich_(Telekom)
Minimum Kit sponsorship revenue in million euros about 2.0 was reached at Year SC_Paderborn_(Sunmaker)
min_summary: Overall Kit sponsorship revenue in million euros has increased over the Year.

The line rapidly increased by 233.33% from Year Bayer_04_Leverkusen_(Barmenia) to Borussia_Dortmund_(Evonik),increased by 677.78% from Year FC_Augsburg_(WWK) to FC_Bayern_Munich_(Telekom),remained stable by 83.33% from Year FC_Schalke_04_(Gazprom) to FSV_Mainz_05_(Kömmerling),increased by 150.0% from Year Fortuna_Düsseldorf_(Henkel) to Hertha_BSC_Berlin_(Tedi),increased by 265.0% from Year SC_Paderborn_(Sunmaker) to SV_Werder_Bremen_(Wiesenhof), and lastly, increased by 700.0% from Year Union_Berlin_(Aroundtown) to VfL_Wolfsburg_(Volkswagen).
